import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { switchMap } from 'rxjs'; import { CustomersService } from '../customers.service.'; import { Customer } from '../models/customer.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-details-route', templateUrl: './details-route.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details-route.component.css'] }) export class DetailsRouteComponent { customer?: Customer; constructor( private customerService: CustomersService, private activeRoute: ActivatedRoute, private router: Router ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.activeRoute.params .pipe(switchMap((params) => this.customerService.getCustomerById(params['id']))) .subscribe({ next: (customer) => (this.customer = customer), error: () => { this.router.navigate(['/not-found']); }, }); } }
